title: Roy Askevold
text:
Roy Askevold (1 July 1935 – 30 March 2005) was a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="amateur%20boxer">amateur boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
He was born and died in <a href="Oslo">Oslo</a>, and represented the sports club <a href="SK%20av%201909">SK av 1909</a>. He finished seventeenth in the light-middleweight division in the <a href="boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics">boxing at the 1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
